text:
The FDA granted emergency use authorization to the #Covid19 #vaccine developed by Pfizer for #children ages 5 to 11. Check out this article by UChicago Med where Assoc. Prof. Allison Bartlett answers common questions parents have about what comes next. 
https://t.co/LfXaBAK2yp https://t.co/Zz3EVyIjMc
